amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that prohibits Federal employee health care plans from covering abortion services, except when the life of the woman is endangered.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 6 in the Congressional Record of July 17, 1995, to delete the provisions of the bill that prohibit federal employee health care plans from covering abortion services, except when the life of the woman is endangered.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoyer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 235 (Roll no. 526).
